title: RK hall
text: Radhakrishnan Hall of Residence , or commonly known as R.K.Hall, is named after the renowned scholar and statesman, Dr. Sarvapalli Radhakrishnan, President of India from 1962-1967. Its glorious history boasts of a total of 50 GC (General Championship). [ citation needed ]

title: Infrastructure
text: The Hall has a total of 434 rooms and it currently houses 650 students.The Hall's glorious history boasts of 24 Sports GC (General Championship) and 24 Social-Cultural GC and 2 Tech GC.

title: Sports
text: There are 9 playgrounds in total, which include a Football ground, Basketball Ground, Volleyball Ground and a Cricket ground.

title: Shops and Eateries
text: A total of 7 Shops and Canteens in the Hall, which include the RK Night Canteen, RK Juice Centre, RK Xerox Centre, RK General Store, Snacks Corner (Sukhendu da's) and Night Snacks Corner (Samar da's) shops.
